column5: Enjoy warm summer breezes on the expansive back patio overlooking Little Bay in scenic Rockport, Texas. The property is situated comfortably at the large opening of a canal that flows through Key Allegro. During the day enjoy fishing right off the back porch or take a relaxing cruise on a kayak or paddle board. An underwater light provides hours of entertainment and fishing at night.
column8: Key Allegro Little Bay House -- Underwater Light
